original_text: While they are feeling so hungry, I will prepare a feast for them. I will cause them to become drunk, and they will become helpless. They will sleep for ever and they will never wake up again.’ That is what the Lord says. While they are feeling so hungry, I will prepare a feast for them. korean_text: 열정이 일어날 때에 내가 연회를 베풀고 그들이 취하여 기뻐하다가 영원히 잠들어 깨지 못하게 하리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: While they are feeling so hungry
I will prepare a feast for them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 위해 잔치를 준비할 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will cause them to become drunk
and they will become helpless
They will sleep for ever
and they will never wake up again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 다시는 깨어나지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
